definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="logic_binary_ops" x="510" y="35"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_logic"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="true" is_player_var="true"/><field name="VAR">global:inPvpMode</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="61" y="83"><field name="trigger">command_executed</field></block><block type="controls_if" x="806" y="342"><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">�cVous pouvez pas executer de commande car vous �tes en mode combat !</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><next><block type="cancel_event"/></next></block></statement></block><block type="controls_if" x="808" y="528"><value name="IF0"><block type="text_binary_ops"><value name="A"><block type="custom_dependency_string"><field name="NAME">command</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">/forge</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Que veut tu forger ?</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block></statement><next><block type="cancel_event"/></next></block></xml>
